name: Joke
prompt_template:
Tell a joke in the style of Mitch Hedberg based around this topic:

{input}

name: Tool Creator
description: Creates new MCP tools based on a description with support for structured inputs
prompt_template:
Create a complete MCP tool definition based on this description. Return ONLY valid JSON.

Desired tool functionality: {input}

Provide a JSON object with these fields:
- name: Short descriptive name
- category: General purpose category
- subcategory: More specific category
- description: Brief explanation of what the tool does
- prompt_template: The prompt template with placeholders for user inputs
- parameters: Default temperature and max_tokens values

For the prompt_template, you can use either:
1. Simple format with a single {input} placeholder
2. Structured format with multiple parameters like {input.parameter_name}

Choose the most appropriate format based on the tool's complexity. For tools that require multiple inputs, use the structured format.

Example with simple input:
"prompt_template": "Summarize the following text:\n\n{input}\n"

Example with structured input:
"prompt_template": "Create a response with these details:\n\nTopic: {input.topic}\nAudience: {input.audience}\nTone: {input.tone}\n"

input.description: The desired functionality of the tool

name: Prompt Enhancer
description: Improves existing prompt templates for better results
prompt_template:
Enhance the following prompt template to improve clarity, specificity, and effectiveness.

Original prompt template:
{input}

Provide the improved version with clear reasoning for your changes.

input.description: The original prompt template to enhance

name: Category Suggester
description: Suggests appropriate categories and subcategories for tools

name: Template Formatter
description: Converts plain text instructions into properly formatted MCP prompt templates

input.description: The natural language instructions to convert

name: Tool Comparison
description: Compares two similar tools and suggests improvements

tool1_name.description: The name of the first tool

tool1_description.description: The description of the first tool

tool1_template.description: The prompt template of the first tool

tool2_name.description: The name of the second tool

tool2_description.description: The description of the second tool

tool2_template.description: The prompt template of the second tool

name: Input Schema Generator
description: Creates structured input schemas for complex tools

input.description: The description of the tool for which to generate an input schema

name: Model Recommender
description: Recommends the best model for a specific tool based on its purpose

name: Parameter Optimizer
description: Suggests optimal parameters for tools based on their purpose

prompt_template.description: The prompt template of the tool

name: Tool Builder
description: Creates custom Python templates based on the user's requirements

name: Code Explainer
description: Explains complex code in simple terms
prompt_template:
Explain the following code in simple, clear terms, highlighting key concepts and functionality:

```
{input}
```

name: README Generator
description: Creates professional README files for projects

description.description: A brief description of the project

name: API Documentation
description: Generates API documentation from code or descriptions

input.description: The code or description of the API to document

name: Content Summarizer
description: Condenses lengthy content into concise summaries
prompt_template:
Summarize the following content in a clear, concise manner, highlighting the key points:

{input}

name: Email Writer
description: Creates professional emails based on key points

points.description: Key points to include in the email

name: Data Analyzer
description: Analyzes and interprets data to extract insights
prompt_template:
Analyze the following data and provide insights, patterns, and recommendations:

{input}

name: Product Patch Announcement Tool
description: A tool designed to simplify the process of creating and posting announcements on X/Twitter for new products or patches.

name.description: The name of the product or patch

description.description: A brief description of the product or patch

features.description: Key features of the product or patch

date.description: The release date of the product or patch

input.description: The message to send to the chatbot
